descriptionHtml:
This save game is Sonya Lvl 1.
Sonya is my True Nord. A pretty Blonde with blue eyes and ready to fight for her homeland. 
Saved just outside the very first dungeon at the start of the game.
   
For Sonya and her good looks I recommend the following mods:

Clean BodiesMain_file_-_Includes_clean_hands_-18-1-1
No_More_Blocky_Faces-1_40
Detailed_Faces-2_00-26-2-0
Detailed_Lips-1_20-689-1-2
Match-hair-closer_match_v_1_1-627-1-1
Natural_Eyes_High_Res-3589-1
AOF_Believable_Hair_-Female_and_Male--4307-1-1(1)
author: Mark Freeman
